inclusion.criterion: Primary Immune Deficiencies: Chronic granulomatous disease (CGD)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Available donor as follows: Cohort A - Fully HLA matched sibling or other first-degree family member
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with adequate organ function as measured by Cardiac: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) at rest must be ≥ 35%.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pulmonary: forced expiratory volume-one second (FEV1), forced vital capacity (FVC), diffusing capacity of the lungs for carbon monoxide (DLCO) > 50% predicted
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled bacterial, viral, or fungal infection at the time of enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but is currently stable on medication. Donor eligibility criteria are met for Cohort A.
